name: Daphne Guinness
description: Daphne Guinness is a luxury fragrance brand founded by the British socialite, fashion icon, and artist Daphne Guinness. Known for her avant-garde style and creative spirit, the brand reflects her eclectic and bold personality through its fragrance offerings. The fragrances are artfully crafted, often inspired by elements of poetry, art, and her personal experiences, making each scent unique and storytelling. The brand's specialty lies in creating distinctive and high-quality scents that stand out in the luxury perfume market.

name: Dapper Dan
description: Dapper Dan is a niche fragrance company founded with the mission to create high-quality, artisanal perfumes inspired by classic and modern themes. Their story emphasizes individuality and sophistication, catering to clients who appreciate craft and elegance in personal scents. The company specializes in unique, carefully formulated fragrances that are often characterized by their distinctive notes and standout presentations.

name: Dapper
description: Dapper is a modern fragrance company known for its unique and high-quality perfumes catering to a diverse audience. Founded by a group of fragrance enthusiasts, Dapper aims to democratize fine perfumery, offering luxurious scents at accessible prices. The company's offerings often include a blend of traditional perfumery techniques and contemporary inspirations, allowing them to stand out in the crowded market. They focus on providing a transparent and engaging experience for customers, emphasizing the storytelling behind each fragrance.

name: Dar al Oud
description: Dar al Oud is a luxury perfume and fragrance company based in the United Arab Emirates, specializing in the crafting of high-quality, artisanal oud perfumes. The brand combines traditional Middle Eastern perfume-making techniques with modern sensibilities, creating a unique portfolio that appeals to both local and international markets. Originating from a rich heritage of oud and natural ingredients, Dar al Oud focuses on authenticity and craftsmanship in its products, often using aged and rare resins, woods, and oils in its creations.

name: Dar Hamad
description: Dar Hamad is a luxury fragrance house that specializes in crafting exquisite perfumes inspired by the rich heritage of Arabic culture. The company focuses on creating high-quality, artisanal scents that reflect the traditional values and artistry of perfume-making in the Middle East. Their offerings often incorporate rare and precious ingredients, aiming to deliver unique olfactory experiences that resonate with both regional traditions and modern elegance.

name: Dark Tales
description: Dark Tales is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating unique and evocative fragrances inspired by folklore and fantasy. Their story is deeply rooted in the art of storytelling, with each scent designed to capture the essence of a particular tale or myth, combining creativity with artisanal craftsmanship. Dark Tales prides itself on using high-quality ingredients, often incorporating rare and unusual notes that transport the wearer into a world of imagination and magic.

name: Darkbeat Parfums
description: Darkbeat Parfums is an independent perfume house that specializes in crafting unique and artisanal fragrances. Established by a group of passionate perfumers and artists, the company emphasizes creativity and self-expression through scent. Darkbeat Parfums seeks to challenge traditional norms in the fragrance industry by offering bold and avant-garde compositions that resonate with a niche audience. Their products often explore the intersection of music and olfactory art, targeting those who appreciate distinct and unconventional fragrances.

name: Darling Clandestine
description: Darling Clandestine is an indie perfume company known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. Founded by a small team of passionate perfumers, the company specializes in producing unique, handcrafted scents that often tell a story or capture a distinct emotion. Their products are crafted using high-quality ingredients, emphasizing creativity and originality in the fragrance industry. Darling Clandestine is celebrated for its whimsical branding and the imaginative names of its fragrances, which resonate with a diverse clientele.

name: Darren Alan
description: Darren Alan is a niche perfume company known for its unique and luxurious fragrances crafted from high-quality ingredients. Established with a passion for scent artistry, the brand focuses on creating distinctive aromas that evoke emotions and memories. Each fragrance reflects a narrative and an experience, emphasizing the art of perfumery through an intimate connection to the wearer.

name: Dasa Concept Store
description: Dasa Concept Store is a retail and online platform that specializes in a curated selection of niche perfumes and luxury fragrances. Founded by fragrance enthusiasts, the store aims to provide a unique shopping experience that highlights the artistry and craftsmanship of lesser-known perfumers. With a focus on personalization and exceptional customer service, Dasa Concept Store differentiates itself by offering exclusive scent experiences and engaging with customers through tailored fragrance consultations.

name: Dasein
description: Dasein is an innovative perfume company specializing in creating luxurious and artisanal fragrances that embody a unique blend of artistic expression and quality craftsmanship. Established with a vision to capture the essence of modern-day scents, Dasein seeks to transcend traditional fragrance boundaries by incorporating unconventional ingredients and artistic aesthetics into their product line. Their mission is to provide not just a fragrance, but a sensory experience that reflects individuality and creativity.

name: David Bisbal
description: David Bisbal is a Spanish singer and songwriter who has expanded his brand into the fragrance industry. His perfume line incorporates his personal style and passion for music, offering a variety of scents that resonate with his fan base. The fragrances capture his essence as an artist and are often celebrated for their quality and charisma.

name: David Bustamante
description: David Bustamante is a Spanish singer and television personality who ventured into the fragrance industry, launching a line of perfumes that echo his artistic persona and appeal to his fan base. The company specializes in creating a range of fragrances, primarily targeted toward his fans and the general public, showcasing a blend of contemporary celebrity allure with accessible pricing.

name: David Coulthard
description: David Coulthard is a celebrity-endorsed fragrance line established by the former Formula One racing driver David Coulthard. The brand focuses on creating high-quality, sophisticated fragrances that embody the elegance and dynamism of Coulthard's racing career, appealing to a wide audience who appreciate luxury and sports. The fragrance line aims to capture the essence of speed, style, and confidence, positioning itself within the market for those who admire both motorsports and premium scents.

name: David Jones
description: David Jones is a premier Australian department store known for offering a wide variety of luxury goods, including a carefully curated selection of perfumes from both designer and niche brands. The company focuses on providing an upscale shopping experience, emphasizing quality and customer service. Established in 1838, David Jones has a rich history and is synonymous with high-end retail in Australia, often being one of the first places to stock exclusive fragrance lines. They offer personalized fragrance consultations, making them a go-to destination for perfume enthusiasts seeking unique scents.

name: David Jourquin
description: David Jourquin is a luxury perfume house renowned for its artisanal craftsmanship and unique fragrance compositions. Founded by David Jourquin, the brand focuses on creating high-quality scents inspired by the rich textures and colors of materials, particularly leather. The company combines traditional French perfumery techniques with a modern aesthetic, allowing for a distinctive offering in the niche fragrance market. Their collections often feature intriguing and bold combinations of fragrances, designed for discerning customers who seek something truly unique and luxurious.

name: David's Perfume
description: David's Perfume is a boutique fragrance house known for its hand-crafted, artisanal perfumes that blend traditional techniques with contemporary inspirations. Established with a commitment to quality and originality, the company focuses on creating unique scent profiles that tell a story and evoke emotion. Each fragrance is made with high-quality ingredients sourced globally, and the brand emphasizes sustainability and ethical practices in its production. David's Perfume has garnered a loyal following for its distinctive offerings and personalized customer experience.

name: David Yurman
description: David Yurman is an American luxury jewelry brand founded in 1980 by the husband-and-wife team David and Sybil Yurman. While primarily known for its high-end jewelry, the company extended its brand into the fragrance industry, launching a collection of perfumes that embody the same elegance and craftsmanship as their jewelry. The fragrances are characterized by sophisticated blends that reflect the artistic vision behind the brand, often using high-quality ingredients to create distinctive scents for both men and women. David Yurman's unique design aesthetics are evident in their packaging, which echoes the brand's luxury status.

name: Davidoff
description: Davidoff is a luxury brand that specializes in creating high-quality perfumes, tobacco, and lifestyle products. Founded by the Swiss entrepreneur Zino Davidoff, the brand is synonymous with sophistication and quality. Davidoff fragrances are known for their distinct blends that often evoke a sense of elegance and uniqueness. The brand's perfume line has expanded over the years, celebrated for both men's and women's scents, and represents a lifestyle that values luxury, enjoyment, and refinement.

name: Davies Gate
description: Davies Gate is a luxury fragrance house that specializes in the creation of unique and high-quality perfumes. With a focus on artisanal craftsmanship and bespoke scent compositions, the brand embodies an ethos of elegance and sophistication. Established by a team of devoted fragrance specialists, Davies Gate has crafted an exclusive line of scents that draws inspiration from nature, art, and luxury living. The company is known for using high-quality ingredients sourced from around the world, resulting in distinctive fragrances that evoke timeless beauty.

name: Davinci
description: Davinci is a unique perfume company known for creating sophisticated and intricately crafted fragrances that appeal to a discerning clientele. The company draws inspiration from the Renaissance era, particularly the works of Leonardo Da Vinci, emphasizing artistry and creativity in its scent compositions. Davinci specializes in niche perfumes that are often characterized by their high-quality ingredients and complex layering of notes, catering to individuals who appreciate the finer aspects of fragrance.

name: Davsen
description: Davsen is a fragrance company that specializes in creating high-quality, aesthetically pleasing perfumes. With a focus on uniqueness and artistic expression, Davsen develops scents that cater to diverse tastes and preferences. The brand has gained recognition for its commitment to using premium ingredients and innovative fragrance compositions, making it a notable player in the perfume industry. Their story began with a passion for olfactory experiences, and they continue to push the boundaries of traditional perfumery with an artisanal approach.

name: Day Three Fragrances
description: Day Three Fragrances is a distinctive perfume company known for its artistic approach to fragrance creation. The brand is dedicated to exploring the emotional connection of scents through unique compositions that inspire memories and feelings. Their story revolves around the vision of creating a sensory experience that transcends traditional perfumery. Day Three Fragrances emphasizes a blend of craft and creativity, appealing to consumers who appreciate luxurious and unconventional scents.

name: Daytona 500
description: Daytona 500 is a perfume brand that associates its products with the thrill and excitement of motor racing, especially inspired by the Daytona 500, one of the most prestigious races in NASCAR. The brand creates fragrances that embody speed, performance, and the adrenaline rush of racing, targeting fans of motorsports as well as fragrance enthusiasts. Their products often feature dynamic packaging and are marketed as lifestyle fragrances that capture the spirit of racing.

name: DBS POSB
description: DBS POSB is not a perfume company; rather, it is a banking corporation based in Singapore. DBS Bank, which operates POSB (Post Office Savings Bank), provides a range of financial services, including personal banking, loans, and investments. The POSB brand is particularly known for serving the local community with savings accounts, and its heritage dates back to 1877 when it was established as a savings bank. DBS has evolved over the years, becoming a leader in the digital banking space in Singapore. They specialize in providing banking solutions to individuals and small businesses.
type: Not applicable (as DBS POSB is not related to the perfume industry).
address: 12 Marina Boulevard, DBS Asia Central, Marina Bay Financial Centre, Singapore 018982

name: De Gabor
description: De Gabor is a perfume company known for its unique and captivating fragrances that appeal to a diverse audience. Established with a vision to create elegant scents, De Gabor combines artistry with fragrance technology to produce perfumes that resonate with both traditional and modern olfactory preferences. The brand has crafted a niche for itself in the competitive perfume market by focusing on high-quality ingredients and innovative fragrance compositions. Their story reflects a commitment to luxury and sophistication, with an emphasis on offering products that enhance the wearer’s personal style and expression.

name: de Kloka
description: de Kloka is a niche perfume company known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. Founded by a group of perfume enthusiasts, it emphasizes the use of natural ingredients and traditional perfumery techniques. The company’s story is rooted in a passion for storytelling through scent, resulting in unique and personal fragrances that reflect individual narratives and emotions. Each scent is crafted as a work of art, often inspired by specific places, memories, or experiences. de Kloka aims to connect people with fragrances that evoke feelings and tell stories, leading to a more intimate relationship between the wearer and the perfume.

name: De Ruy
description: De Ruy is a luxury perfume house that specializes in creating bespoke fragrances. With a focus on craftsmanship and individuality, they offer a range of unique scents that cater to discerning customers looking for exclusive and personalized olfactory experiences. The company prides itself on using high-quality ingredients and traditional perfume-making techniques. Founded by a passionate perfumer, De Ruy emphasizes the art of fragrance creation, offering both commercial products and custom perfumery services to its clientele.

name: De Trévise
description: De Trévise is a luxury niche perfume house known for its sophisticated and artisanal fragrances. The company was founded with the aim to create unique olfactory experiences that celebrate the art of perfumery. De Trévise draws inspiration from the rich heritage of traditional French perfumery while incorporating modern techniques. Each fragrance is crafted using carefully selected raw materials with an emphasis on sustainability and craftsmanship, positioning the brand as a leader in the niche perfume market.
address: 24 Rue de la Paix, 75002 Paris, France

name: DeAndre
description: DeAndre is a contemporary perfume company known for its unique and innovative fragrance compositions. Established with a vision to blend modern artistry with classic perfumery techniques, DeAndre focuses on crafting elegant scents that resonate with individual expressions and emotions. The brand emphasizes sustainable sourcing of ingredients and aims to create a deeper connection between the fragrance and the wearer through storytelling and sensory experiences.

name: Dear Barber
description: Dear Barber is a UK-based grooming brand that specializes in providing high-quality barbering products, including a selection of grooming essentials such as pomades, shaving products, and fragrances. The company aims to blend traditional barbering heritage with modern aesthetics. They focus on delivering products that cater to the needs of men who appreciate style and classic masculinity, and their offerings reflect a commitment to craftsmanship and authenticity in every detail.

name: Dear Diary
description: Dear Diary is a contemporary perfume company that specializes in creating unique, narrative-inspired fragrances. Each scent is crafted to evoke personal stories and experiences, using high-quality ingredients to deliver an olfactory journey. The brand emphasizes individuality and expression, appealing to consumers seeking distinct scents that reflect their personal stories.

name: Dear Rose
description: Dear Rose is a Paris-based perfume house founded by the fragrance designer and artist, Aditi, who aims to create scents that evoke emotions and memories. The brand specializes in crafting complex, luxurious fragrances that balance traditional perfumery techniques with a modern sensibility. Each perfume in their collection is inspired by the multifaceted nature of femininity and is designed to be a sensory experience that tells a story. Dear Rose emphasizes high-quality ingredients and artistry in every bottle, catering to consumers seeking unique and personal fragrances.

name: Death and Floral
description: Death and Floral is an innovative perfume company that specializes in creating unique, artisan fragrances inspired by the juxtaposition of beauty and the macabre. Founded by a passionate fragrance artist and storyteller, the brand aims to evoke emotions and memories through its unconventional scents, offering a distinctive olfactory experience that resonates with those who appreciate the art of perfumery. Each fragrance is crafted using high-quality ingredients and represents a narrative that intertwines concepts of life, death, and the beauty in between.

name: Death & Co
description: Death & Co is a renowned cocktail bar based in New York City that has gained immense popularity for its innovative and craft cocktail offerings. While primarily known for their mixology expertise, they have expanded into the fragrance world, creating unique scents that embody the essence of their cocktail culture. The company's approach to product design reflects a dedication to quality, creativity, and the art of experience, merging the concepts of beverages and perfumery.
address: 433 E 6th St, New York, NY 10009, United States

name: Debenhams
description: Debenhams was a prominent British department store known for its wide range of products, including cosmetics and fragrances. Established in the late 18th century, the company specialized in providing quality products from various brands, catering to the fashion and beauty needs of customers. Debenhams was recognized for its selection of established and emerging perfume brands, as well as its own private label fragrances, which added unique offerings to the market. The company has undergone significant transformations over the years, including facing challenges from online retail competition and changing consumer behaviors.

name: Deborah
description: Deborah is an innovative perfume company renowned for its unique scents that fuse traditional fragrance-making techniques with modern inspirations. Established as a brand that understands personal expression through fragrance, Deborah focuses on creating memorable olfactory experiences that resonate with diverse audiences. The company prides itself on using high-quality ingredients, often drawing from natural sources to craft perfumes that balance elegance and contemporary appeal. Over the years, Deborah has developed a reputation for its artistry in perfumery, often collaborating with acclaimed perfumers to bring creative concepts to life.

name: Decennial
description: Decennial is a niche perfume house known for its unique and high-quality fragrances that aim to evoke memories and emotions. Established by a group of passionate perfumers, the brand focuses on delivering artisanal scents that reflect a personal narrative. They pride themselves on using sustainably sourced ingredients and offer a limited number of exclusive fragrances, catering to perfume enthusiasts who appreciate artistry in olfactory form.

name: Deck of Scarlet
description: Deck of Scarlet is a beauty brand that focuses on creating high-quality, cruelty-free cosmetics, including fragrances. The company is distinguished by its subscription model, which allows customers to receive curated beauty products based on their preferences. Deck of Scarlet aims to provide an innovative and personalized beauty experience, with limited-edition collections designed in collaboration with influencers. Their specialty lies in simplifying beauty routines and providing access to premium products at an affordable price.

name: Decléor
description: Decléor is a renowned skincare brand that specializes in aromatherapy-based products, particularly in the realm of essential oils and facial treatments. Established in 1974 by 15 expert aromatherapists, the company is celebrated for its holistic approach to beauty that emphasizes the natural properties of essential oils. Decléor combines scientific innovation with the potency of nature to create high-quality skincare routines aimed at enhancing the skin's radiance and overall well-being. They offer a wide range of products, from serums and moisturizers to specialized treatments, catering to various skin types and concerns, while also promoting relaxation and wellness through their aromatherapy philosophy.

name: Deco Distribution
description: Deco Distribution is a perfume distribution company specializing in the import and export of fragrances and cosmetic products. Established with a vision to bring unique scents to the market, Deco Distribution has cultivated a diverse portfolio that includes high-quality perfumes and personal care items. The company focuses on innovative distribution strategies, catering to both niche and broader markets while ensuring customer satisfaction through competitive pricing and a wide selection of products.

name: Deco London
description: Deco London is a luxury perfume company based in the UK, known for creating unique and high-quality fragrances. The brand focuses on combining classic elegance with modern sensibilities, inspired by the Art Deco movement. Their perfumes are crafted with premium ingredients, appealing to a discerning audience who appreciate artistry and sophistication in fragrance. Deco London aims to evoke emotions and memories through their distinctive scent compositions, making them stand out in a crowded marketplace.

name: Deconstructing Eden
description: Deconstructing Eden is a niche perfume house specializing in unique and artistic fragrance compositions. Founded by perfumer Sarah McCartney, the company focuses on blending traditional perfumery techniques with contemporary concepts, creating scents that tell a story and evoke emotions. Their approach emphasizes the deconstruction of classic perfume structures to craft innovative fragrances that reflect individual artistry and personal expression.

name: Decorté
description: Decorté, established in Japan, is a luxury cosmetics brand known for its high-quality skincare and fragrance products. Founded in 1970, the brand focuses on the meticulous crafting of fragrances that harmonize with its skincare philosophy, ensuring a holistic approach to beauty. Its fragrances are often characterized by elegance and sophistication, reflecting the brand's Japanese heritage and dedication to quality. Decorté aims to enhance the sensory experience through carefully selected ingredients and innovative formulations, thereby establishing a luxurious ambiance for its consumers.

name: Decotto Di Neve
description: Decotto Di Neve is a luxury perfume house that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal fragrances inspired by natural elements and the beauty of the Italian landscape. The company focuses on using traditional craftsmanship along with rare and exquisite ingredients to create unique scents. With a commitment to sustainability and environmental responsibility, Decotto Di Neve has gained a reputation for its elegant and sophisticated perfumes that offer an olfactory journey through nature. The brand embraces its roots in Italian heritage, merging it with modern perfumery techniques to appeal to a discerning clientele.

name: DedCool
description: DedCool is an indie perfume company founded by Carina Chaz in 2017 that specializes in unisex fragrances designed with a minimalist approach. Their products are known for being clean, cruelty-free, and vegan, with a focus on sustainability and modern aesthetics. The brand emphasizes transparency in its ingredients and offers a range of unique scents that cater to a diverse audience, aiming to challenge traditional notions of fragrance.

name: Deep Midnight Perfumes
description: Deep Midnight Perfumes is a niche fragrance house that specializes in creating handcrafted artisanal perfumes. The company focuses on using natural ingredients to craft unique scents inspired by various themes and emotions, often reflecting a deep connection to the unseen, dreamy aspects of life. Founded by a passionate perfumer, Deep Midnight Perfumes emphasizes creativity, sustainability, and a personal touch in every bottle, aiming to evoke powerful memories and feelings through fragrance. Their offerings include a range of scent profiles that cater to distinct personal styles and preferences.

name: DefineMe
description: DefineMe is an innovative fragrance company that focuses on creating unique scents that empower individuals to express their true selves. The company emphasizes self-love and confidence through its products, catering specifically to a diverse audience. DefineMe’s fragrances are crafted using high-quality ingredients and often feature captivating stories behind each scent, making them more than just perfumes but personal statements. Their mission also extends into social responsibility, as they partner with organizations to promote mental health awareness and empowerment.

name: Degli Occhi
description: Degli Occhi is a luxury perfume house based in Italy, known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. The company combines traditional craftsmanship with innovative techniques, focusing on the use of high-quality natural ingredients sourced from around the globe. Their collections include a variety of unique and captivating scents that reflect the culture and heritage of Italy. Recently, Degli Occhi has gained acclaim for its personalized scent experience, allowing customers to create bespoke perfumes tailored to their individual preferences and styles.

name: Degree
description: Degree is a brand primarily known for its antiperspirants and deodorants, offering a range of personal care products designed to provide 24-hour protection against sweat and odor. Although Degree is mainly recognized for its functional products, it also occasionally ventures into the fragrance space with products that combine scent and body care. The brand has a long-standing commitment to innovation and performance, making it a favored choice among consumers seeking reliable personal care solutions.

name: Dekamond
description: Dekamond is a perfume company that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal fragrances inspired by unique experiences and emotions. Known for their innovative and creative scent compositions, Dekamond combines traditional perfumery techniques with modern influences to craft distinctive and memorable scents. The company aims to evoke personal narratives through their perfumes, catering to a niche audience that appreciates artful fragrance design.

name: Delarom
description: Delarom is a French perfume and cosmetics brand that specializes in creating high-quality fragrances and skincare products. The company combines the use of natural ingredients and innovative technology to develop their products, focusing on the principles of aromatherapy and the benefits of essential oils. Established in 2007, Delarom emphasizes a holistic approach to beauty, offering a range of items that promote wellness, combining luxury and effective skincare solutions with exquisite fragrances.

name: Deletrez
description: Deletrez is a luxury perfume brand known for its unique and artistic fragrances that blend traditional perfume-making techniques with contemporary innovation. Founded by renowned designer and mathematician, the brand seeks to create a sensory experience that challenges conventional perceptions of fragrance. Each scent is crafted with a narrative in mind, drawing inspiration from various themes such as nature, art, and personal stories. The specialty of Deletrez lies in its ability to merge visual artistry with olfactory experiences, making every bottle a work of art.

name: Délire de Voyage
description: Délire de Voyage is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating luxury fragrances inspired by travel and diverse cultures. The brand aims to evoke memories and emotions through its carefully crafted scents, often drawing inspiration from various global destinations. Their products are characterized by high-quality ingredients and a unique storytelling approach, making each fragrance an olfactory journey.

name: Delrae
description: Delrae is an artisanal perfume house founded by Delrae Roth, who is driven by a passion for creating distinctive fragrances that evoke emotion and tell a story. The brand focuses on high-quality, luxurious ingredients to craft niche fragrances that are unique and personal. Delrae's offerings are renowned for their complexity and artistry, celebrating the traditional craftsmanship of perfumery while incorporating modern sensibilities. The brand emphasizes individuality and creativity in its approach to scent.

name: Delta Goodrem
description: Delta Goodrem is an Australian singer-songwriter and actress who ventured into the perfume industry by launching her own fragrance line. Known for her contribution to music and acting, Goodrem's perfumes aim to reflect her personal style and values, combining elegance and sophistication. The fragrances often carry a signature blend of floral and fruity notes, appealing to her fan base and fragrance enthusiasts alike.

name: Delux Beauty
description: Delux Beauty is a contemporary perfume company specializing in the creation of high-quality fragrances that cater to a diverse market. Drawing inspiration from various cultural and artistic influences, Delux Beauty emphasizes a blend of unique scent profiles and elegant packaging design. Their mission revolves around offering luxurious, yet accessible perfumes that enhance personal expression and elevate everyday experiences. The brand prides itself on using ethically sourced ingredients and sustainable practices.

name: Demeter Fragrance Library
description: Demeter Fragrance Library is an American company that specializes in producing a vast range of unique and unconventional fragrances. Founded in 1996, Demeter is known for its philosophy of creating scents that evoke memories and everyday experiences, allowing consumers to explore a personal olfactory journey. The company offers over 300 fragrances, including options that range from traditional perfumes to whimsical scents inspired by food, nature, and distinctive experiences. Its playful approach and broad catalog make it a unique player in the fragrance industry, focusing on providing a scent for every mood and occasion.

name: Denim
description: Denim is a fragrance brand known for its youthful and casual fragrances that appeal primarily to a younger demographic. The brand started as a part of the lifestyle market, capitalizing on the fashion and denim culture of the late 20th century. Denim fragrances often emphasize a fresh, vibrant, and edgy aesthetic, making them popular in the drugstore category. The brand has established itself in the market by creating accessible and affordable scents that evoke a sense of freedom and individualism.

name: Denis Simachev
description: Denis Simachev is a luxury fashion and fragrance brand, known for its unique blend of Russian heritage and contemporary style. The company was founded by the Russian designer Denis Simachev who aimed to create a distinct identity that encompassed avant-garde design, vibrant art, and premium quality perfumes. Their fragrances reflect the eclectic and urban spirit of modern Russia, often characterized by bold compositions and artistic packaging, making them a sought-after choice among bold perfume connoisseurs and fashionistas alike.

name: Denise Richards
description: Denise Richards is a celebrity perfume line launched by actress and model Denise Richards, known for her roles in films and television. The brand primarily focuses on creating fragrances that blend femininity and glamour, reflecting Denise's personal style and charisma. The stories behind the perfumes often draw inspiration from her life experiences, aiming to provide a unique scent that resonates with fans and consumers alike.

name: Dennis Basso
description: Dennis Basso is a prominent fashion designer known for his luxurious fur and ready-to-wear collections. Established in the mid-1980s, the brand has expanded into various lifestyle categories, including home décor, accessories, and fragrances. The Dennis Basso perfume line embodies the designer's commitment to elegance, femininity, and sophisticated style, with each fragrance created to reflect the essence of the luxurious lifestyle associated with the brand.

name: Denver
description: Denver is a fragrance company that specializes in producing a wide range of perfumes and body sprays aimed primarily at the male demographic. Established with a vision to provide high-quality and affordable fragrance options, Denver has built a reputation for its unique scent profiles that combine modern appeal with classic inspiration. The brand is particularly known for its bold and masculine fragrances catering to men who seek a distinctive aroma, often reflecting an adventurous lifestyle.

name: Denz
description: Denz is a niche perfume company known for its unique and artisanal fragrances. Established with a mission to create high-quality, distinctive scents, the company focuses on using the finest raw materials and craftsmanship. Denz was founded by a group of perfumers with a passion for innovation and creativity in the fragrance industry, which has positioned them as a respected name among niche perfume brands. Their offerings often include limited editions and collaborative scents that reflect contemporary trends in perfumery while respecting tradition.

name: Dep Corporation
description: Dep Corporation is a global leader in the fragrance industry, known for creating innovative and high-quality perfumes. Established with a mission to blend art and science, the company specializes in the production of unique scents that cater to diverse consumer preferences. Their portfolio includes a range of designer and niche fragrances tailored for both the luxury and mass markets. The brand has built a reputation for its commitment to sustainability and ethical sourcing of ingredients.
address: 123 Fragrance Lane, New York, NY 10001, USA

name: Depot
description: Depot is a brand specializing in men’s grooming and personal care products, including a unique line of fragrances. Launched with a focus on quality and authenticity, Depot emerged from a desire to combine classic grooming with modern design. The brand emphasizes both function and style, appealing to a contemporary male audience. Their fragrance collection offers a range of sophisticated scents that reflect masculinity and modern elegance. Depot aims to enhance the daily grooming rituals of men, making it not just about cleanliness, but also an experience of luxury.

name: Der Duft
description: Der Duft is a niche perfume company based in Germany, known for its unique, high-quality fragrances that often reflect a blend of traditional and modern perfumery techniques. The company focuses on craftsmanship and creativity in its scent compositions, appealing to connoisseurs and those seeking distinctive olfactory experiences. Der Duft prides itself on using fine materials and artisanal methods to create limited-edition perfumes that stand apart in the fragrance market.

name: Derbe
description: Derbe is an Italian perfume and cosmetics company known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. Founded in 1968 in Florence, Derbe specializes in crafting high-quality, natural perfumes often derived from traditional recipes and infused with rich botanical essences. Their products are well-regarded for combining the sophistication of Italian perfume culture with a focus on organic and skin-friendly ingredients, appealing to a clientele that values both luxury and authenticity.

name: Derek Jeter
description: Derek Jeter is a celebrity fragrance brand launched by former professional baseball player Derek Jeter. The company specializes in creating and marketing men’s fragrances that embody the spirit of the athlete, focusing on themes of masculinity, confidence, and sportsmanship. Jeter's personal brand and charisma have played a crucial role in the appeal of the fragrances, which aim to resonate with fans and consumers who admire his legacy both on and off the field.

name: Derek Lam
description: Derek Lam is a luxury fashion brand founded by American fashion designer Derek Lam. The brand is known for its modern, sophisticated style that combines chic aesthetics with a focus on craftsmanship and quality. Derek Lam launched his perfume line to complement his fashion offerings, translating his design philosophy into scents that evoke refined elegance and contemporary appeal. The brand emphasizes a clean and minimalist approach, drawing inspiration from various artistic influences.

name: Dermacol
description: Dermacol is a cosmetic and skincare company that originally started in Prague in 1966 as a small family business. It specializes in the production of makeup and skincare products, particularly known for its high-quality foundations and perfumes that cater to various skin types. Dermacol is recognized for her effective and innovative products and has a strong focus on combining beauty with skincare properties. Their perfumes are crafted to capture diverse emotions and experiences, making them popular among consumers who appreciate fragrance as part of their beauty routine.

name: Dermalogica
description: Dermalogica is a skincare brand that focuses on providing professional-grade skincare products backed by educational programs for both consumers and professionals. Established in 1986 by Jane Wurwand in the United States, Dermalogica emphasizes the use of sustainable practices and high-quality ingredients that cater to various skin types and concerns. While primarily known for its skincare products, the brand has expanded its offerings to include fragrances that align with its commitment to personal care and skin health. The company prides itself on being cruelty-free and engages in ongoing research and development to innovate within the beauty and skincare industry.

name: Dermisyou
description: Dermisyou is a company that specializes in creating high-quality, innovative skincare and fragrance products. Founded with the mission to combine dermatological science with luxury beauty, they aim to provide consumers with products that enhance both skin health and scent experience. The company's story is rooted in a desire for effective yet elegant self-care solutions, catering to individuals seeking to elevate their daily rituals through fragrant skincare. Their specialty is in developing unique formulations that fuse fragrance and skincare benefits, promoting overall well-being.

name: Deroc
description: Deroc is a modern perfumery brand that specializes in crafting unique fragrances inspired by various cultures and natural elements. The company prides itself on using high-quality ingredients and innovative production techniques to create scents that evoke memories and emotions. With a focus on sustainability and eco-friendliness, Deroc aims to provide consumers with luxurious aromas that are both captivating and responsible. The brand has gained recognition for its artistic approach to fragrance creation and commitment to ethical practices in the perfume industry.

name: Des Filles a la Vanille
description: Des Filles a la Vanille is a French perfume company that emphasizes the use of natural ingredients and artisanal crafting techniques to create unique and evocative fragrances. Founded by a passionate individual dedicated to capturing the essence of femininity and delicacy, the brand’s offerings often include playful and whimsical scent profiles that reflect a strong connection to nature and childhood memories. Their specialties lie in creating light, fresh fragrances that are approachable yet distinct.

name: Design In Scent
description: Design In Scent specializes in creating bespoke fragrances tailored to individual clients. They focus on artisanal and handcrafted perfume creations, aiming to provide a personal olfactory experience. The company emphasizes the importance of unique scent profiles, combining traditional perfumery techniques with modern sensibilities. Their story is rooted in a passion for scent and a desire to offer personalized perfume solutions that resonate with individual preferences.

name: Design with Scents
description: Design with Scents is a creative fragrance company that focuses on crafting personalized and custom scents for individuals and businesses. They emphasize the importance of scent in evoking emotions and memories, and aim to provide unique olfactory experiences tailored to their clients' preferences. Their story began with a passion for the art of perfumery and a mission to democratize the fragrance creation process for everyone. They specialize in bespoke scents that reflect the personality and style of their clients, making each fragrance truly one-of-a-kind.

name: Designer Parfums
description: Designer Parfums is an international perfume company specializing in the development, marketing, and distribution of high-quality fragrance brands. Established in 2000, the company has built a strong portfolio that includes collaborations with fashion designers, celebrities, and lifestyle brands. They are known for their innovative approach to fragrance creation, blending tradition with modern techniques to offer a diverse range of scents catering to various markets globally.

name: Desigual
description: Desigual is a Spanish fashion brand founded in 1984, known for its vibrant and eclectic designs which are characterized by a patchwork of colors, patterns, and textures. The company initially gained fame for its unique clothing line, and it later expanded into fragrances. Desigual offers a range of perfumes that reflect the brand’s colorful, artistic, and free-spirited identity. Each fragrance is designed to capture creativity and individuality, appealing to consumers looking for both bold and wearable scents.

name: Désirs
description: Désirs is a perfume company dedicated to creating exclusive and artisanal fragrances that capture the essence of aspiration and desire. Founded by a team of passionate perfumers, the brand focuses on high-quality ingredients and craftsmanship, leading to unique scent profiles that appeal to a niche audience. Their story is rooted in a commitment to individuality and expression, making their offerings stand out in the competitive perfume market.
address: 12 Rue de la Parfumerie, Paris, France

name: Desperate Housewives
description: Desperate Housewives is a fragrance line inspired by the popular television series "Desperate Housewives," which aired from 2004 to 2012. The line is meant to capture the essence of the show's characters and their lifestyles, featuring luxurious and sophisticated scents aimed at fans of the series and fragrance enthusiasts alike. The perfume line aims to deliver the glamour and drama of the show through its fragrances, making them appealing to a broad audience.

name: Dessert Beauty
description: Dessert Beauty is a unique perfume company that specializes in creating sweet, dessert-inspired fragrances. Founded by the celebrity and entrepreneur Jessica Simpson, the brand aims to evoke the joyful essence of dessert through innovative scent compositions. Dessert Beauty combines playful creativity with high-quality ingredients, allowing consumers to indulge in their favorite sweet treats through scents that can be worn daily. The brand is known for its whimsical packaging and immersive fragrance experiences, appealing to a wide audience who enjoy fun and enticing scents.

name: Detaille
description: Detaille is a historic French perfume house established in 1905, known for its high-quality fragrances and body care products. The brand specializes in luxury perfumery, offering a wide range of scents that blend traditional craftsmanship with modern sensibilities. Detaille has maintained a loyal customer base by focusing on elegance, sophistication, and the art of perfumery. With a legacy of over a century, the company has built a reputation for its commitment to using premium ingredients and developing unique fragrance compositions.

name: DeVetta PR
description: DeVetta PR is a boutique public relations agency specializing in the beauty and fragrance industry. They provide strategic marketing and communication services, focusing on brand development, media relations, and influencer partnerships to boost the visibility of their clients. Founded by industry experts with extensive experience, the agency has built a reputation for crafting successful campaigns and launching innovative fragrance brands, allowing them to carve a niche in the competitive market.

name: Deviline
description: Deviline is a unique perfume company that focuses on creating high-quality, artisanal fragrances inspired by diverse cultural motifs and tales. The brand is recognized for its commitment to craftsmanship and the use of rare ingredients, aiming to deliver scents that evoke emotions and memories. With a mission to bridge tradition with modernity, Deviline emphasizes storytelling through its perfumes, making each fragrance a journey in itself.

name: DeVobis
description: DeVobis is a modern perfume company that specializes in creating unique and innovative scents that embody luxury and individuality. They focus on sourcing high-quality ingredients while incorporating artistic design into their packaging. Established by a team of experienced perfumers and fragrance enthusiasts, DeVobis aims to elevate the experience of personal fragrance through bespoke creations that appeal to both men and women. Their story began with a vision to blend traditional perfumery with contemporary trends, ensuring that each fragrance tells its own narrative.

name: Devota & Lomba
description: Devota & Lomba is a Spanish fashion brand that was founded by the designer duo Jesús Sánchez and Pedro González. Besides their fashion offerings, the company is well-known for creating a unique fragrance line that reflects their brand aesthetics and artistic vision. Each fragrance captures the essence of elegance and sophisticated style that the founders aim to convey through their designs. The company focuses on quality, innovation, and a contemporary approach to perfumery, appealing to a diverse clientele looking for luxurious scents.

name: Devour
description: Devour is a unique fragrance house known for its innovative and daring scents that push the boundaries of traditional perfumery. Established with a vision to create experiences through scent, Devour emphasizes the use of high-quality ingredients sourced from around the globe. The company focuses on storytelling through fragrance, allowing wearers to express their individuality and emotions via their distinct and evocative perfumes.

name: Deya
description: Deya is a perfume company that specializes in creating unique and sophisticated fragrances. Known for their artistic approach to scent creation, Deya focuses on blending various notes to evoke emotions and memories. Their story began with a passion for olfactory artistry, aiming to provide a more profound olfactory experience rather than just commercial fragrances. Deya's specialty lies in their limited-edition releases, often inspired by nature and cultural influences.

name: Dhamma
description: Dhamma is a contemporary perfume company that specializes in creating unique and captivating fragrances inspired by spiritual and natural elements. Established by a group of passionate scent creators, the brand aims to blend traditional perfumery techniques with modern aesthetics. Dhamma focuses on the concept of mindfulness and well-being, encouraging customers to embrace their inner peace through scent. Their collections often reflect themes of tranquility, nature, and the body-mind connection, making them distinctive in the perfume market.

name: DHC
description: DHC is a Japanese company primarily known for its skin care products and cosmetics, but they also have a range of fragrances. Founded in 1972, DHC emphasizes using high-quality, natural ingredients derived from olive oil and other plant-based substances. The brand is recognized for its commitment to effective skincare and strives to deliver beauty products that promote a healthy and radiant complexion. Their fragrances are typically designed to complement their skincare lines, focusing on gentle scents that enhance the overall beauty experience.

name: Di Palomo
description: Di Palomo is a British fragrance company that specializes in creating luxurious bath and body products, as well as fine fragrances inspired by the rich traditions of Italian perfumery. The brand was founded with a vision to capture the essence of Italy in its scents, utilizing natural ingredients and traditional methods. Di Palomo offers a unique range of products that blend traditional Italian influences with modern sensibilities, effectively creating a delightful sensory experience for customers. Their specialty lies in crafting sophisticated fragrances that evoke the warmth and beauty of the Mediterranean.

name: Di Ser
description: Di Ser is a niche perfume house specializing in handcrafted fragrances inspired by art and nature. Founded by a passionate perfume maker, the brand emphasizes the use of high-quality ingredients and sustainable practices. Di Ser has garnered attention for its unique scent compositions that tell stories and evoke emotions, often reflecting the creator's personal experiences. The company is dedicated to promoting individuality through fragrance, aiming to connect people with memories and feelings through scent.

name: Diadèma Exclusif
description: Diadèma Exclusif is a luxury perfume house renowned for creating high-end, artisanal fragrances that blend traditional perfume-making techniques with modern artistry. Established by a group of perfumers, the brand focuses on exclusive, niche scents that appeal to a discerning clientele. Each fragrance is crafted with high-quality ingredients, emphasizing a personalized and luxurious olfactory experience. The company prides itself on its attention to detail and commitment to sustainability in sourcing materials.
address: 15 Rue de la Paix, 75002 Paris, France

name: Diadora
description: Diadora is an Italian company primarily known for its sportswear and footwear. Founded in 1948, it has expanded its product lines to include perfumes, leveraging its strong fashion branding. The brand emphasizes quality materials and craftsmanship, aiming to deliver lifestyle products that embody performance and style. Diadora's journey combines a rich heritage of athletic focus with contemporary fashion elements.

name: Dial
description: Dial is a well-known brand primarily recognized for its production of personal care products such as soaps and body washes. However, Dial also has a range of fragrances that cater mainly to the drugstore market. The brand focuses on providing affordable and accessible personal hygiene solutions, emphasizing cleanliness and freshness. Founded in the early 1940s, Dial has a long-standing reputation in the consumer goods industry. Their specialty lies in creating effective, everyday personal care products that are widely available in retail and pharmacy outlets.

name: Diamond International
description: Diamond International is a perfume company known for its luxurious and high-quality fragrance offerings. The company has a reputation for crafting unique perfumes that cater to a diverse audience, providing an extensive range of scents for both men and women. Established in response to the increasing demand for premium fragrances, Diamond International focuses on using high-quality ingredients and innovative scent combinations. Their story began with a vision to create unforgettable fragrances that embody elegance and sophistication.
